TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EditableDesignerRegion extends System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion

summary.span: 表示关联控件的设计时标记内的可编辑内容区域。

span.span: Represents an editable content region within the design-time markup for the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类，以帮助在设计时管理模板。Use the class to help manage templates at design time. 一个将使用此类的实例及其方法来生成 HTML 标记的区域的内容。A will use an instance of this class with its method to generate HTML markup of the region's content. ## Examples 此示例演示如何创建包含两个可单击区域的控件和一个具有两个视图或模板对象。This example shows how to create a control with two clickable regions and an object with two views, or templates. 编译项目，然后在可视化设计器中打开页，并切换到设计视图 (WYSIWYG)。Compile the project, then open the page in a visual designer and switch to design (WYSIWYG) view. 有两个可单击视图**视图 1**并**View2**。There are two clickable views, **View1** and **View2**. 单击**视图 1**并将其拖到正下方的可单击区域为空的设计器区域的页的下半部分中的控件。Click **View1** and drag the control from the lower part of the page into the empty designer region just below the clickable regions. 单击**View2**并将其拖到空的设计器区域的控件。Click **View2** and drag the control into the empty designer region. 单击**视图 1**同样，并在区域中的使用再次出现。Click **View1** again, and the region with the reappears. 单击**View2**并在区域中的使用再次出现。Click **View2** and the region with the reappears. 切换回源视图，以查看如何在 HTML 标记中保留所做的更改Switch back to source view to see how your changes are persisted in the HTML markup > [!NOTE] > 你的项目必须具有对 System.Design.dll 程序集的引用。Your project must have a reference to the System.Design.dll assembly. [!code-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.cs#1)] [!code-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.vb#1)] [!code-aspx-csharp[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/CS/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.aspx#8)] [!code-aspx-vb[SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner/VB/SimpleMultiRegionControlDesigner.aspx#8)]
